actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The mimic makes two Pseudopod attacks. If it is grappling a creature, it can replace one attack with a Bite attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one grappled creature. _Hit:_ 7 (1d8+3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) acid damage.

actions.name: Pseudopod
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 10 (2d6+3) bludgeoning damage. If the mimic is in object form, the target is subjected to its Adhesive trait.

special_abilities.name: Adhesive (Object Form Only)
special_abilities.desc: The mimic adheres to anything that touches it. A Huge or smaller creature adhered to the mimic is also grappled by it (escape DC 13). Ability checks made to escape this grapple have disadvantage.

special_abilities.name: False Appearance (Object Form Only)
special_abilities.desc: While the mimic remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary object.

special_abilities.name: Grappler
special_abilities.desc: The mimic has advantage on attack rolls against any creature grappled by it.

special_abilities.name: Monstrosity Resilience
special_abilities.desc: The mimic is resistant to exhaustion and to the frightened condition.
